Nasus.name: Nasusº
Nasus.title: ºøthe Curator of the Sandsºøº
Nasus.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe enigmatic creature known as Nasus came to the League from a faraway world, and served as part of a vast and learned desert empire. There he was a respected and enlightened individual, having been made the Keeper of the Great Library. However, he was also part of a race of animalistic creatures that served as the rulers and protectors of the people. Unfortunately, there were others of his kind that believed they were more than protectors. They were under the egotistical delusion that they had ascended to become gods. War on Nasus's world was never more than a breath away, as these deluded others sought to enslave the people and establish a totalitarian sovereignty. In the midst of a heated battle, just as Nasus was about to slay his treacherous brother Renekton, he was pulled through the cosmos to a summoning circle in Runeterra.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAt first angered that he had been taken just as he was about to cripple the enemies of his people, Nasus' advanced intellect won out when he heard the pleas of mercy from the summoners. He learned that Runeterra was also filled with its own brand of injustice. This danger was no less threatening than what he had fought against at home, and champions were needed to protect the people of this world. Heeding the call, Nasus chose to take his place in the League of Legends, knowing that his brothers and sisters would carry on the fight back home. These days, he is the Curator of the Sands, feeling most at home in the crumbling ruins of the Shurima Desert. However, recent disturbing news has reached the Keeper's ears - rumors that perhaps his brother had not in fact been left behind. If this were the case, the destruction of Renekton would quickly become Nasus' main priority, before this world too faces the threats of his brother's forked tongue and endless ambition.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøThe Curator of the Sands, though contemplative, is not to be trifled with.ºøºøºøº
Nasus.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe enigmatic creature known as Nasus came to the League from a faraway world, and served as part of a vast and learned desert empire. There he was a respected and ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøPaying attention to last hitting with Siphoning Strike will have a large impact at the end of a game.øºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIf you're solo, Spirit Fire is a great way to farm a lane. It can be bad if you're in a lane with 2 and you push too far. Find the right balance between Siphoning Strike last hits and AE farming.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIf you have low defenses, people will focus you down even during your ultimate. Try buying some survivability items even in your DPS builds.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhile transformed by his ultimate, Nasus is stronger than most champions in the League. Engage him only if you have a clear advantage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøMax rank Wither is a very effective counter to Attack Damage characters, so try to avoid getting caught alone by it.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºNasus is prone to being kited. Try not to engage him at full health.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøSiphoning Strikeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøNasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.øºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
Active:ººøºø Nasus's next basic attack will deal ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }})ºø physical damage.º

ºPassive:ººøºø Siphoning Strike permanently gains ºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºøºøºøºøº damage if it kills an enemy unit. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.ºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: Witherº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøNasus ages his target, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.øºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºNasus ages target champion over ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøº seconds, initially slowing their Movement Speed by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% and increasing to øº{{ e1 }}ºøºøºøºø% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºSpirit Fireº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºNasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºNasus unleashes a spirit flame at a target location, dealing an initial ºøºøºøº{{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }})ºø magic damage.º

ºøFor the next º{{ e3 }}ºøºøºø seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by øºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøº and are dealt an additional ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage each second.ºøº

spells.name: ºøFury of the Sandsº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøNasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, cast ranges, and drains nearby enemies' max Health converting into bonus damage for the duration.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºNasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºø, Attack Range by øº{{ e2 }}ºø, and cast ranges by øº{{ e4 }}.

ºøºWhile the storm rages, he deals ºøº{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøº% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second (ºøºøº{{ e5 }}ºøºøºøºø damage max per second) as magic damage and converts it into bonus Attack Damage.øºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºSoul Eaterº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºNasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Lifesteal.ºøºøºøº
